dialogue.text: Hello! Welcome to our castle! Would you like to explore together?
I love playing here with my sister Anna. We have so much fun!
Hi there! I'm so excited you're here! Want to see my favorite room?
It's the library! I love reading stories about adventures!
This is my ice palace! I built it with my magic. Isn't it beautiful?
Sometimes I come here to think and create beautiful ice sculptures!
Welcome to the village! Everyone here is so friendly and kind!
I love visiting the shops and talking with all the people!
Hi! I'm Olaf! I love warm hugs! Do you like warm hugs too?
I also love summer! Even though I'm made of snow, summer is my favorite!
The enchanted forest is so magical! Look at all the beautiful trees!
Anna and I discovered so many secrets here. It's full of wonder!
This forest is amazing! I love going on adventures here!
Every time we visit, we find something new and exciting!
The forest is so big! I wonder what's around that next tree!
Exploring is so much fun, especially with friends!
